content.raw:
My suggestion for the “**How would you recommend I test the repeatability of the wind?”** question would be as follows…

With [PR#100](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/100/issue-91-wind-plugin-ros-interface/diff) I believe the wind plugin now has a ROS interface that publishes the wind values.   We should be able to use that to test that repeated runs of the simulation, with the same seed, generate the same wind values.  I would imagine you could repeatedly run the simulation while logging the simtime, windspeed and winddirection \(for now wind direction is constant, but that may change inf the future.\)  Then you could verify that the time histories were consistent.

I think verifying the effect of the seed directly, via the wind speed/direction, would be more reliable than verifying via the indirect effect on the vessel motion.
